original_text: And Asa did what was good and right in the eyes of the Lord his God.
korean_text: 아사가 그의 하나님 여호와 보시기에 선과 정의를 행하여

sentences.original_text: And Asa did what was good and right
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아사는 선하고 옳은 일을 행했습니다
